summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6208 for the improvement of Beacon Ave. from 51st Ave. South to 59th Ave. South; by grading and graveling and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88412, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
